IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: CAMP TWIN LAKES, INC. IS A NONPROFIT ORGANIZATION THAT PROVIDES YEAR-ROUND THERAPEUTIC CAMPING PROGRAMS FOR CHILDREN WITH SERIOUS ILLNESSES, DISABILITIES AND LIFE CHALLENGES.
IRS990.MissionDesc: CAMP TWIN LAKES (CTL), FOUNDED IN 1993, IS A NOT-FOR-PROFIT ORGANIZATION THAT OFFERS YEAR ROUND RECREATIONAL, THERAPEUTIC, AND EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMS FOR CHILDREN FACING SERIOUS ILLNESS, DISABILITIES AND OTHER PHYSICAL, EMOTIONAL AND SOCIAL CHALLENGES. IN COLLABORATION WITH MORE THAN 60 COMMUNITY NON-PROFIT PARTNERS, CTL PROVIDES YEAR ROUND LIFE CHANGING EXPERIENCES AT ITS STATE-OF-THE-ART, FULLY ACCESSIBLE AND MEDICALLY SUPPORTIVE CAMPSITES, LOCATED IN RUTLEDGE AND WINDER, GEORGIA. ADDITIONAL SERVICES INCLUDE A SUMMER LOCATION IN WARM SPRINGS ALONG WITH HOSPITAL BASED CAMP PROGRAMS. ANNUALLY, WE SERVE APPROXIMATELY 10,000 CAMPERS AND LEVERAGE 3,500 VOLUNTEERS. CTL SUBSIDIZES 70% OF THE COST TO SEND EACH CHILD.
IRS990.Desc: PROGRAM ACCOMPLISHMENTS INCLUDE OPERATING TWO YEAR ROUND CAMPSITES, ONE ADDITIONAL SUMMER SITE, AND CAMP-TO-GO PROGRAMS WITHIN LOCAL PEDIATRIC HOSPITALS TO SERVE MORE THAN 10,000 CHILDREN WITH SERIOUS ILLNESS AND DISABILITIES EACH YEAR. OUR CAMPSITES ARE MEDICALLY SUPPORTIVE AND FULLY ACCESSIBLE TO MEET THE UNIQUE NEEDS OF THE CHILDREN WE SERVE. CTL SUBSIDIZES 70% OF THE COST OF CAMP FOR EVERY CAMPER SERVED.

Form990ScheduleAPartVIGrp.ExplanationTxt: PUBLIC SUPPORT IS MEASURED USING 5 YEAR COMPUTATION PERIOD THAT INCLUDES ORGANIZATION'S CURRENT YEAR AND PREVIOUS FOUR YEARS.

BusTrInvolveInterestedPrsnGrp.TransactionDesc: MINDSPRING COLLABORATIVE, A COMPANY OWNED BY LARRY LORD, WAS ENGAGED BY CTL TO PROVIDE LAND SURVEY, ARCHITECTURAL, AND LAND USE CONSULTING FOR A PROJECT.

NRC GRADING AND HAULING, A COMPANY PARTIALLY OWNED BY JIM BRANCH, WAS ENGAGED BY CTL TO PROVIDE GRADING AND HAULING RELATED TO CLEARING AND PREPARING LAND FOR THE VARIOUS CONSTRUCTION PROJECTS UNDER OUR STRATEGIC INVESTMENT INITIATIVE. PONDS, FARM BARN AND STORAGE, GROUP HOME AND STAFF CABINS.
SPR ATLANTA, A COMPANY OWNED BY CHRIS SCHRODER, WAS ENGAGED BY CTL TO MANAGE THE PRODUCTION OF CTL'S NEW WEBSITE.

KITCHEN AND BATHROOM CABINETS + KITCHEN APPLIANCES
ATLANTA HOMES & LIFESTYLES- ADVERTSING FOR PC

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: DOUG HERTZ AND MICHAEL HERTZ ARE RELATED, FATHER AND SON. ADRIAN POWELL AND COLLEEN BLAU ARE RELATED, IN-LAWS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THERE IS AUDIT COMMITTEE THAT OVERSEES THIS PROCESS. ONCE A DRAFT IS PREPARED, IT IS APPROVED BY THE FINANCE COMMITTE AND FULL BOARD BEFORE IT IS SUBMITTED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD AND EXECUTIVE OFFICERS COMPLETE STATEMENTS ANNUALLY AND COMPLIANCE IS MONITORED BY THE BOARD.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THERE IS AN HR COMMITTEE THAT ALONG WITH EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE, IS RESPONSIBLE FOR EVALUATING THE CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER AND REVIEWING SALARY AND BENEFITS. NO CHANGE IN CEO OR OTHER EXECUTIVE STAFF COMPENSATION CAN BE AUTHORIZED WITHOUT APPROVAL OF THE BOARD.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THESE DOCUMENTS ARE AVAILABLE ON OUR WEBSITE. THEY ARE ALSO AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.
